programme.title: Aku Istri Yang Dicintai Tapi Sering Disakiti
programme.desc: Disha Devina, Jonathan Andriano, Andi Soraya, Iqlima Kim

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep173
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. programme.title: Tamu Idola Ep2
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan realiti yang mengejutkan di mana artis memasuki dunia peminat mereka, dengan mengunjungi mereka secara tiba-tiba. Penonton dapat melihat momen intim ketika artis terlibat dalam rutinitas rutin harian dan pengalaman para peminat setia mereka.

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A small and quiet port in Busan outskirt became the battlefield of local gangsters.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: I Am The King
programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Decibel
programme.desc: A former navy commander receives a threatening call who claims to blow up a stadium with a sound-responsive bomb. He must face the secret he left buried in the deep sea to track this terrorist down.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: Killing Romance
programme.desc: As a popular actress has growing discontentment towards her marriage, she begins planning to kill her rich husband with her neighbor.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Watching
programme.desc: When a female workaholic is kidnapped by a security guard in the company's parking garage, she'll do whatever it takes to escape.

programme.title: Oh! My Ghost
programme.desc: FD Taemin meets a female ghost who lives in the studio he works. As mysterious events happened in the studio, they join hands to investigate and protect his job and her sleeping place.

programme.title: The Tenor - Lirico Spinto
programme.desc: A strong partnership and friendship begins when a talented Korean vocalist met a Japanese music producer. At the peak of his career, he was diagnosed with thyroid cancer and might loss his voice...

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in South Korea, three female office co-workers who enroll in English classes in hopes to advance their careers, struggle to expose the corruption inside their company.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Extreme Job
programme.desc: An ill-performed narcotics team takeover a fried chicken joint near the drug gang's safe house for around-the-clock surveillance. Yet their cooking talent turned the restaurant famous overnight...

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: Hot Young Bloods
programme.desc: In a rural town in 1982, a tough young girl secretly has a crush on a playboy. When a transfer student arrives, the playboy falls in love with her causing unexpected chaos at school.

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: The Delicacy Ep4
programme.desc: Representatives in various fields are invited to submit creative recipes; top chefs fight for the interesting one and cook accordingly. Allen Lin, Meng Mei Qi, and David Wang gather as the judges to select and add the outstanding dishes in to the menu of winners.

programme.title: Maybe You Are Falling In Love Ep6
programme.desc: With a one-day time limit, male and female guests gather in three everyday life scenes to connect with and understand each other. Breaking the typical dating show format, host Zhang Chunye and the ""Support Team"" (Jam Hsiao, Dazhang Wei, Pu Yixing, Cai Guoqing, and Wang Yaoqing) witness the growing emotions between guests, accompanying them through the sweetness and setbacks of their emotional journey.

programme.title: Travel through Jiangsu Season 2 Ep30
programme.desc: Travel around the scenic spots and historic sites and the streets and alleys of the whole province of Jiangsu, look for historians, scholars, folk artisans, etc., explore a glimpse of what traditional Chinese culture and discover the unique charm of Jiangsu.

programme.title: First In Last Out Ep15
programme.desc: Six guests, including Zhang Han, Wei Da Xun, Zhang Bin Bin, Qin Xiao Xian, Zhang Yan Qi, and Zhang Jia Yuan, are invited to be the Fire Freshmen at the local fire station to live and train with the firefighters, unlocking their rescue skills and sharing an unforgettable firefighting experience together.

programme.title: Informal Talks Season 8 Ep3
programme.desc: It is a cultural talk show where four hosts, Ryan Zuo, Di Yang, Ming Chen, and Cynthia Chan, along with 11 young representatives from different countries, come together. With a humorous and playful approach, they promote cultural exchange between China and the world, discussing social topics and customs from various countries.

programme.title: Study On The Island Season 2 Ep4
programme.desc: The bookstore is located in the healing Dong'ao Island of Zhuhai; it mainly focuses on the relationship between a certain emotion and literature in people's daily life; through the dialogue and exchange of "bookstore managers", which spiritual healing is obtained from it.

programme.desc: Using "learning through fun" to demonstrate the correct way to "read ten thousand books, travel ten thousand miles," and to embark on a unique journey of discovery through a different path of growth.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3940
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3427
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep67
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2919
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3828
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4890
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep69
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2202
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep1001
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigator William is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, William uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kongs biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Chings wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: Hong Kong Family
programme.desc: Eight years ago, the family in a Hakka-walled village was torn apart during a combative winter solstice dinner. Eight years later, their cousin returns home from England and seeks to reunite the family for another winter solstice dinner. While things seem to be falling apart, this dinner may well be an opportunity to mend relations.

programme.title: Hero Among Heroes
programme.desc: Wong Fei Hung assists Lin Ze Xu to crack down the opium trading in Guangzhou. Barac provokes Beggar So to kill Wong and Lin as they hinder his opium business. When So finally resolves his misunderstanding with Wong, he decides to join Wong to defeat Barac and stop the opium import.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ais feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Moscow Mission
programme.desc: Based on the 1993 true event of the "China-Russia Train Robbery", a gang of criminals commits a heist, stealing cash and goods from the cross border train. A Chinese police officer disguises as a businessman takes charge of the operation to arrest the criminals, but uncovers a bigger conspiracy instead

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Facets Of Love
programme.desc: Set in the Ming Dynasty, the story revolves around a brothel and the girls who work there. The film begins by following the life of a girl from a poor family, who is sold by her mother to the brothel. While she is the most beautiful of the girls and attracts many clients, the girl hopes to escape this sad way of life one day.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.desc: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma

programme.title: Hagola Ep12
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: Gurus onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bholes unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations. First of its kind, an Animated musical comedy, this show brings together laughter, action and music.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep9
programme.desc: Kicko and Super Speedo are out on a mission to be the saviour of Sun City, fighting an array of villains and their set of super cars.

programme.title: Honey Bunny As Police Patrol Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Aaj Ke Angaarey
programme.desc: Priya, a school teacher, and her class of 11 children participate in an inter-school competition and travel out of town. Along the way, a group of masked bandits stop their bus and take them hostage.

programme.title: Dadagiri
programme.desc: Goddess Lakshmi gets angry with Lord Vishnu who forgets to bring her a present on her birthday. To compensate for the mistake, Lord Vishnu narrates a tale of two lovers from Earth.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Judwaa
programme.desc: Twin brothers Raja and Prem Malhotra get separated at birth but are reunited by fate to defeat Ratanlal, a local gangster, who wants to destroy the Malhotra family.

programme.title: Bemisal
programme.desc: A young Sudhir is adopted by Mr Chaturvedi and develops a strong bond with his son, Prashant. When the police arrests Prashant for performing illegal abortions, Sudhir comes to his rescue.

programme.title: Dasara
programme.desc: In a town that is dependant on coal mining, The lives of three childhood friends turn chaotic when they get into a fight with the son of the village headman.

programme.title: ACP Shiva
programme.desc: Shivakumar, a dishonest cop, ensures that he is transferred to Chennai, where he exploits his position for financial gain. He also supports GK, a local MP, against the commissioner of Chennai.

programme.title: Aan: Men at Work
programme.desc: DCP Hari Om Patnaik, along with his reformed force, takes up the challenge to make Mumbai crime-free. However, things take a turn for the worse when they lose two of their team members.

programme.title: Siddhartha
programme.desc: Surya goes to Bangkok at his mother's request and changes his name to Siddhartha. He falls in love with Sahasra, but his mother asks him to marry the girl from his enemy's family.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Aan Baan
programme.desc: Raja Bahadur indulges in various unlawful activities and is always saved by his brother, Suraj. When Bahadur decides to marry Rekha, Suraj, who is in love with her, falls into a dilemma.

programme.title: Rangoon
programme.desc: Julia journeys to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. There, she finds herself enamoured by Jemadar Malik, a soldier.

programme.title: Captain
programme.desc: A group of soldiers head out on a dangerous mission into a forest to uncover a mystery. However, they soon discover that they are in over their heads.

programme.title: Hello Brother
programme.desc: Vishal, a policeman shot by tycoon Khanna, is saved by a heart transplant. He finds himself working with the spirit of his donor, Hero, to investigate the businessman's drug racket and seek revenge.

programme.title: Hello Brother
programme.desc: Vishal, a policeman shot by tycoon Khanna, is saved by a heart transplant. He finds himself working with the spirit of his donor, Hero, to investigate the businessman's drug racket and seek revenge.

programme.title: Aarakshan
programme.desc: Dr Anand, the principal of STM College, fights to abide by the OBC reservation verdict of the Supreme Court. However, he and his disciples have to overcome many obstacles while doing so.

programme.title: Bhagavanth Kesari
programme.desc: A former prisoner is adamant about training his adoptive daughter to join the Indian Army. However, his mission is interrupted by a conflict with a ruthless businessman.

programme.title: Rangoon
programme.desc: Julia journeys to the Indo-Burma border to perform for the troops during World War II, on the insistence of Billimoria, her lover. There, she finds herself enamoured by Jemadar Malik, a soldier.

programme.title: Ram Shastra
programme.desc: Dhonga is sentenced to five years in prison after Ram Sinha busts his plans of assassinating the police commissioner. After his release, Dhonga seeks revenge on Ram who is now a police inspector.

programme.title: Meri Zindagi Ek Agneepath
programme.desc: Ramakrishna, a mechanic, is framed for the murder of his wife by his father-in-law who then takes his son away from him. Following his release, Ramakrishna sets out to find his child.

programme.title: Fauladi Policewala
programme.desc: Ibrahim, a police inspector, gets posted in a village with a very low crime rate. In pursuit of an adventurous life, he plans to obtain a transfer with the help of local thugs, but his plan backfires.

programme.title: Nachnewale Gaanewale
programme.desc: Two friends sing and dance at functions for a living and decide to get their respective children married to each other. To their dismay, the son refuses to comply.

programme.title: Hum Kisise Kum Nahin
programme.desc: Munna Bhai, a gangster, meets Komal and instantly falls in love with her. In a bid to marry her, he must fight with Komal's elder brother, Dr Rastogi, and her lover, Raja.

programme.title: Eight Millimeter
programme.desc: A reel of eight-millimeter film turns a private investigator's life upside down.

programme.title: The Pursuit Of Happyness
programme.desc: Once homeless, Christopher Gardner (Will Smith) turns his life around and becomes the head of his own brokerage firm.

programme.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks
programme.desc: Pop-singer Chipmunks Alvin, Simon and Theodore turn a songwriter's life upside-down.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: A look at the top-secret, high-tech espionage war going on between cats and dogs, of which their human owners are blissfully unaware.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can
programme.desc: Barely 17 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.

Totally devoted to Joe, his 50,000 hip new roommates' single-minded mission is to help him--whether he wants it or not--as Joe learns about sex, bugs and rock n roll. Based on the MTV short film Joe's Apartment created by John Payson.

programme.title: Street Fighter
programme.desc: A commando colonel leads a covert mission to rescue kidnapped relief workers from a psychotic warlord.

programme.title: Around The World In 80 Days
programme.desc: It is 1872, and a British inventor, a Chinese thief and a French artist set off to circumnavigate the globe in 80 days. They travel by land, air, sea, and in-line skates in order to beat the clock and finish where they started.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: The attempted assassination of the president is told from five different perspectives.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Welcome to Rekall, the company that can turn your dreams into real memories. For Douglas Quaid, even though he's got a beautiful wife whom he loves, the mind-trip sounds like the perfect vacation from his frustrating life.

programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Russia - Steve Backshall and his team paddle up the remote Kronotsky River in Russia, in a protected area which is also full of wildlife such as Brown Bears.

programme.title: Celebrity Race Across the World S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's a race to the finish line in Troms for the four celebrity teams. Which will get there first and be crowned champions?

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how Campbell's spells out the letters for perfect soup; why Razzles need a lot of pressure to become sweet candy gum; how beer becomes fine Canadian whiskey; and why dry ice is crucial to making sweet and sticky brioche.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Discover why nimble fingers are crucial in making perfect spanikopita; why less friction makes ginger snaps healthier; how a universally loved Sicilian dessert started with one family; and what adds a whole year of shelf life to a box of sweet apple juice.

programme.title: Mammals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The New Wild - Mammals have mastered every environment on Earth, but today the planet is changing faster than ever. Mammals must change with it to have a chance of survival in this, the new wild.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Discover how Campbell's spells out the letters for perfect soup; why Razzles need a lot of pressure to become sweet candy gum; how beer becomes fine Canadian whiskey; and why dry ice is crucial to making sweet and sticky brioche.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Discover why potatoes go on a wild hydraulic ride to become crunchy chips; how machines and human hands have to perfectly co-exist to make the South Asian dessert fav gulab jamun; how 6 million eggs can make 75 million delectable almond biscotti.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Discover why peanuts enjoy a good tumble and hot oil roast; how an industrial juicer pours out massive amounts of creamy mango smoothies; the secret chemistry behind full fat bocconcini cheese; and how vegan brownies can be healthy and sinfully delicious.

programme.title: Blue Planet II S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Green Seas - From enchanted kelp forests to undersea prairies, the planet's green seas teem with life. They are the most abundant but fiercely competitive places in the ocean to live.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In the final leg of his journey Alexander visits Busan, a coastal port and South Korea's second biggest city. He takes in a visit to a shaman, and climbs up Sunrise Peak, a UNESCO world heritage site.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep7
programme.desc: In Hong Kong, an old WII detention centre is transformed into a gleaming new university, while respecting the old buildings beneath. And in Wisconsin, USA, and old polluting power station is stripped down and re-engineered into a spacious student facility.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Europe - Robson travels Spain, Portugal and the Canary Islands in search of the highly prized blue marlin. He also eats the poisonous escolar fish.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep10

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep4

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.desc: Bulgaria - Ben Fogle returns to Bulgaria to meet up with nomads Miriam and Peter after four years.

programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.desc: Bulgaria - Ben Fogle returns to Bulgaria to meet up with nomads Miriam and Peter after four years.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Discover why molasses is essentail to producing refined sugar; how the secret to apple danish is the ultimate puff piece; how egg production gets cracking with hi-speed machinery; and how 28,000 perfect tortillas are made each hour.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Discover what a cluster buster is and how it helps to make delicious soup purre; how 240 cans of aerosol whipped cream are produced each minute; why a powerful vacuum is essential to make lollipops; and what paper mills and crab stick production have in common.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep1
programme.desc: In Canada, a tiny turtle ventures through a forest of giants in search of the wetland, and in South Africa, a bushbaby is drawn towards a world of light in his quest to find a home.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Britain S1 Ep1
programme.desc: After a lifetime of travels that have taken her across the globe, Joanna Lumley is making her most personal journey yet, travelling from Essex to Whitby.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Headphones - Headphones: these marvels of miniaturisation are worn by 30 million people in the UK. Hannah Fry visits Bose to find out how the teeny earbud tech works and meets the human testers with 'golden ears'.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Anatomy Gone Wild Ep4
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - The Dune Kingdoms Ep1
programme.desc: Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Refugees of Laikipia Ep2
programme.desc: The mass relocation of an endangered species of Hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta, so the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Giant Creepy Crawlers Ep5
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - White Rhinos of Enasoit Ep3
programme.desc: The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Cape Fur Seals Ep2
programme.desc: On South Africas west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, its a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Chinga the Lion Cub Ep2
programme.desc: In South Africas Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Giant Creepy Crawlers Ep5
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Cape Fur Seals Ep2
programme.desc: On South Africas west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, its a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - White Rhinos of Enasoit Ep3
programme.desc: The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 - Lyca the Painted Wolf Ep1
programme.desc: In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Camouflage and Colouration Ep6
programme.desc: Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Tides of Sweetwater Ep5
programme.desc: A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Mafia Island - Uncharted Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Alien Abyss 1 - Origin Stories Ep1
programme.desc: Get acquainted with an array of ocean oddballs and learn how billions of years worth of changes, from ice ages to asteroid strikes, have shaped their looks and skills. Meet blind worms who fish, walking sharks, tree-climbing crabs, and much more.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands 1 - The Wilds of Winter Ep1
programme.desc: Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Shark Dentist Ep6
programme.desc: Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the oceans vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Leaping Into Life Ep1
programme.desc: Its spring, and the farm is bursting with new life. Watch a ewe give birth to twins, an orphaned Hereford calf struggle to find a surrogate mother, and the top hen nestle down in her maternity coop.

programme.title: Wild Tales from the Farm 1 - Great Escape Ep2
programme.desc: Experience life on the farm as things heat up for summer. Watch animals swelter in a rare heatwave, try to stay cool in the nearby freshwater stream, and stash supplies for fall.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The top six cooks level up tinned food into spectacular brunches and create pasta mash-ups to impress a top food influencer.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep4
programme.desc: In Harrow, Emma and Nick help Shaz and Zarqa, who are exhausted by the constant tidying, their inadequate kitchen and the lack of space to relax in their 1930s semi. Can the team turn chaos into calm?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle's Horse Cart - In the ancient Forest of Dean, expert treehouse-builder Simon Parfett meets Jon and Michelle. Jon runs a forest retreat and has had the idea to turn an old horse cart into unique accommodation for his guests.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Mexico S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The final leg of Paul's culinary voyage is dedicated to liquid-living, as he discovers the American obsession with Mexican coca cola and visits Mexico's most celebrated Mezcal distillery.

programme.desc: Claire's Pop Up Tent - Simon and the team are in an area of outstanding natural beauty, the Blackdown Hills, to help theatrical prop maker Clare with a truly unique project. She has big plans to turn a 1960's trailer tent into funky festival themed accommodation.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Nigella champions the much-maligned bacon of the sea, the anchovy, which she uses to create an elixir to accompany seared steak or crisp, red chicory.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Chocolat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Indulgence - Rachel learns what's really in a chocolate bar and discovers a surprising new trend in Amsterdam. Plus, she makes delicious chocolate banana splits.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's fast food week, and, with a place in the semi-final at stake, the final five cooks level up instant noodles and attempt to bash out Mexican fast food in just 90 seconds.

programme.title: Your Home, Made Perfect S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Yesim and Hasan - Using virtual reality, two top architects compete to remodel Yesim and Hasan's family home in Enfield. Will they go for Julian's minimalist design or Will's pyramid ceiling?

programme.desc: Join British superstar Gordon Ramsay, Italian stallion Gino D'Acampo and French master maitre d' Fred Sirieix as they take a road trip across Mexico and America.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Christmas Special - A festive ending to the series, Gino uncovers the tasty food and Christmas traditions the South of Italy has to offer. He visits Scolastica Market in Bari to pick up some local ingredients with which to cook the perfect Italian Christmas feast.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how easy it is to make a tasty dish with homemade Gnocchi. For a great veggie variation, Jamie bakes an enormous Yorkshire pudding filled with roasted veg and rich gravy and goes on to make an aromatic vegetarian broth. Chetna Makan shows viewers a great and simple dish to batch cook, chicken curry.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep7
programme.desc: For the semi-final, it's social media week. The cooks must level up basic biscuits into Insta-worthy desserts and create a street food menu that would wow on socials.

programme.desc: In 2011, Edward and Hazel set out to build a lighthouse on the north Devon coast. By 2019, they were near bankruptcy with just a rusting shell.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep8
programme.desc: A Festive Ending - Rachel prepares cold crayfish and serves it with warm crayfish soup and a cheese pie. For dessert, she makes a classic Swedish cheese cake, served warm with whipped cream and jam.

programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Semi-Finals - With just 4 bakers left in the competition, the pressure has ramped up once again with patisserie week, including bombe, and a difficult bake reportedly dedicated to the patron saint of baking. For the Showstopper, the bakers are required to make elaborate entremet, complete with mirror glaze and accompanying macarons.

programme.title: Hungry For It S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The finalists level up childhood favourites and cater for a celebrity party attended by Michael Dapaah and AJ Tracey with the help of the eliminated cooks.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S31 Ep13
programme.desc: Graham is joined by US comedy great Kevin Hart, Killing Eve and Broadway star Jodie Comer, Modern Family's Sofia Vergara and Scottish-American actor Alan Cumming. With music from Tom Odell.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S14 Ep9
programme.desc: It's the semi-final and the bakers make elegant, buttery patisserie and a puff pastry layered Italian celebration cake. Who will achieve complete and butter perfection to make it to the final?

programme.title: Airplane Repo S2 Ep10
programme.desc: South Of The Border - Mike Kennedy repos a chopper from the roof of a corporate high-rise. Kevin Lacey infiltrates a Mexican ranch to snatch a family plane stolen by a wayward brother.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Return To Lake Fear - The team uncovers a potential Bigfoot kill zone and launch a squadron of patrol drones to sweep the area for the existence of Sasquatch.

programme.desc: Shadow Of Doubt - A terrified couple calls the team to their home after the wife awoke to a dark figure choking her. Will this unassuming house reveal what is haunting Butte?
