programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2020
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and take a short trip back to 2020!

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4
programme.desc: Show Dog, Show \ Keys to Victory - Tag can't wait to show off her car at the car show. But when Cheddar Biscuit wants to come along and pick up her clown friends along the way, Tag is wary that Cheddar Biscuit will steal her thunder. \ The Not Yet Cadets can't wait to watch Sams big race. But when Sam loses his car key, he challenges the Not Yet Cadets to race around town to find it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Music Player - Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep38
programme.desc: Baa-Baa for Now, New Zealand - When Odlulu enters Fritz as a dog in a sheepherding competition, Fritz uses the Magnet Key to gently guide all the sheep. But when he loses control of the sheep and they spill into Auckland, the Wanderers must find a way to lead the flock back where they belong.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep26
programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep26
programme.desc: Volcano - Ty and Revvit bravely stay behind to build and save their crater from a nearby volcano eruption, but D-Structsdoesn't want them to succeed

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep26
programme.desc: The Cloud / Booverty - Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep3
programme.desc: Wet Hot Ahhh Valley Summer / Grug Vs The Moon - When Eep and Thunk challenge each other in the first-ever dare-off, Thunk faces the deep end - his greatest fear; Grug picks a fight with the moon.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep42
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet - Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold along with Principal Krupp blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep26
programme.desc: Maces And Talons Pt 2 - After Heather and the Flightmare have been captured by Viggo and the Dragon Hunters, Hiccup must develop a plan to outwit this dangerous new enemy

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep52
programme.desc: Switcher-Ruby/Bye Bye Bunker - Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each others point of view. /When Branch decides its time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep26
programme.desc: King Juli-End - King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep7
programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep41
programme.desc: In Dreams - When Puss asks the second witch sister Malaranea for her gem, she casts a spell that makes him a prisoner in his dreams and only Dulcinea can save him

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep41
programme.desc: Extreme Sleepover Club / Vega Swift - Smidge, Guy, Cooper, and Biggie throw an impromptu sleepover in the Fun Factory. But when unexpected visitors show up, will they avoid getting in trouble?/ Satin and Chenille are tasked with babysitting Luna Swift, Novas toddler niece. But she proves to be a bit of a handful

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep41
programme.desc: The Neverending Clover - After Clover is knocked unconscious, the entire kingdom plays along when she wakes up believing she's living in a make-believe storybook world

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep15
programme.desc: The Depths - Lance and Hunk crash on a water planet and must rescue a mind-controlled mermaid civilization

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep41
programme.desc: Chalk The Line / Weighting Is The Hardest Part - Eep cheats her way into being considered an adult; Grug learns he's no longer the strongest caveman and turns to a radical method for building brawn

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep15
programme.desc: No Can Do / Adopt-A-Toad - Chet is determined to open a giant can of tomato juice lands in town and Turbo worries that Chet is becoming obsessed with the can. // Turbo donates his race winnings an animal charity, but accidentally adopts a toad who moves into the clubhouse and becomes an obnoxious house guest.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep67
programme.desc: Pirate Primrose - The tots are playing at pirates, all except Primrose, who is being a princess, naturally. But guess which tot has the best pirating skills when they are needed

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep15
programme.desc: The Case Of The Blue Wall - Everyone is going to play Hide and Seek in Brickabuild but Fuse stops the game because someone has painted the big wall outside his workshop blue! What if they do it again? Or if they decide to paint the rest of Brickabuild? Noddy uses all his investigating skills of who, what, where, when, why and how to work out that the wall must have been painted by someone very tall who likes the colour blue. Smartysaurus! She admits she painted it so that she could be better at hide-and-seek! Noddy helps her to understand that she can play the game without having to cheat. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep3
programme.desc: Dodgems - Marsha decides to be a mechanic but wears Big Chris out with her endless questions. Disaster strikes when Chris dozes off and doesn't listen to her properly

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep3
programme.desc: Why Hippo Has No Hair - You see there was a time when Hippo did have hair lots of hair! She was always harumphingly hot. Then one hot night while Hippo was sleeping a spark from the fire caught the end of her hairy tail! Hippo was on fire! She ran through the bush until SPLOSH! Hippo jumped in the waterhole. And from that day on Hippo stayed in the cool waters without a single hair on her hide. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep4
programme.desc: Why Tortoise Has A Broken Shell - You see there was a time when Tortoise's shell was all shiny and smooth. One day Tortoise discovered the birds were having a Feast in the Heavens and he tricked the Birds into making him a pair of wings. Greedy Tortoise raced the birds beyond the clouds and scoffed the whole feastt! When the Birds found out Tortoise had to jump off a cloud until BOOF!!! He landed on his shiny shell. All the animals pieced Tortoise's shell back together but from that day on Tortoise's shell was all bumpy and broken and he never moved speedily again. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep10
programme.desc: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose - Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien: Exiled Ep57
programme.desc: Raiders Of The Lord Shark - King Julien's submarine sinks in the ocean; Clover & Sage go on quests to test their patience and rage; Mort leads an escape but a spy is in the midst

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep12
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Sickening Fumes of Smartsy Fartsy - In order to retrieve Mr. Krupps locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep57
programme.desc: Too Many Cats - A myriad of Puss clones pour forth from the portal, each with a different personality, until eventually an evil twin shows up to challenge the real Puss

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep5
programme.desc: Cloudy With A Chance Of Hugs / Creek Week - The Trolls share a special hug with a special Troll on Hug DayWhen Creek returns to Troll Village everyone is willing to forgive him except Branch.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep17
programme.desc: Chilling Out in Antarctica - The Wanderers travel to Antarctica to witness the annual march of the penguins. Odlulu and Fritz show up looking to build an awesome fort using the Ice Castle Key. Odlulu's new ice fort separates a waddle of penguins from their eggs. The Wanderers must find a way through the ice fort to reunite the parents with their chicks.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep5
programme.desc: Pit - D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole pit but he overlooks tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep12
programme.desc: Pet Sitters / Narwhalicorn Day - Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize hes missing home. / Kelp feels like he cant choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep6
programme.desc: The Ticket Trail / Flying Solo - Lola, Dylan and Cassie have tickets to the carnival, but when Dylan loses his ticket, the Dew Drops set out to find it. / When Phoebe accidentally gets tossed into Nicholas' diaper bag before a trip to the park, Phoebe has to help a baby bird, while Eden and Athena must help Marcus rehearse for his big concert.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep13
programme.desc: Photo Day Disaster / The Eightful Eight - When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep5
programme.desc: The Case Of The Sleepy Toys - Everyone in Brickabuild keeps falling asleep and no one can get any building work finished. It's all because the lights keep coming on all night! Noddy decides to investigate who is turning the lights on. Bravely overcoming his own fear of the dark, he follows the clues to discover that the lights are being secretly turned on by a scared Carlton, who doesn't like the dark. Kind Noddy tells him that he's not the only one scared of the dark and after Carlton is given a cuddle device to cuddle, everyone can get a good night's sleep! Sleep tight, Noddy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby's Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place but everywhere they try is just too noisy I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep39
programme.desc: Trolling Through Iceland - When Odlulu uses a Wake-A-Troll Key to get her kite down from a tree, she accidentally brings two mythical Icelandic creatures to life. Using their wits and some Icelandic troll knowledge, the Wanderers must find a way to turn these mischievous creatures back to rock.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep27

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Title Unifications" - Champions and interim champions face off to determine who rules the division in four incredible title unification bouts on this episode of UFC Unleashed. Featuring Conor McGregor, Georges St-Pierre, Max Holloway, and Brock Lesnar.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep606UnbreakableJackShoreSignatureSeriesStephenThompsonMyMomentCodyGarbrandt
programme.desc: UFC featherweight Jack Shores recent successes in the UFC have also come with adversity, since his father and coach has been recently diagnosed with cancer. Stephen Wonderboy Thompson breaks down his standout signature moves in Signature Series. Cody Garbrandt reflects on his title fight win against Dominick Cruz at UFC 207.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS GUAYRE BETANCOR
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS GUAYRE BETANCOR - A selection of top goals from Guayre, a leading light for Villarreal in their push to become one of LaLigas elite.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC293AdesanyavsStrickland
programme.desc: After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts. Plus, heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov. See all this and much more on UFC Reloaded

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts EpUFCUltimateKnockouts904HispanicHeritageMonthPt2
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts continues our celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month. See amazing KOs from Brandon Moreno, Kelvin Gastelum, Brian Ortega, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep911TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured the first title defense of newly crowned light heavyweight champion Glover Teixeira against surging contender Jiri Prochazka. See both men train and prepare for their battle for the belt in Singapore.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: "Title Unifications" - Champions and interim champions face off to determine who rules the division in four incredible title unification bouts on this episode of UFC Unleashed. Featuring Conor McGregor, Georges St-Pierre, Max Holloway, and Brock Lesnar.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Submissions

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Cannonier vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Louisville, Kentucky for the first time since 2011 on June 9, and the UFC Fight Night main event at KFC Yum! Center will be one to remember, as middleweight contenders Jared Cannonier and Nassourdine Imavov clash in a bout expected to shake up the 185-pound Top 10. A former world title challenger, the hard-hitting Cannonier is coming off back to back wins over Sean Strickland and Marvin Vettori, moving him closer to another shot at the belt should he defeat Frances Imavov, who owns wins over Edmen Shabazyan, Joaquin Buckley and Roman Dolidze.
